name: Somnium (Sandro Figo)
description:
Discover and survive the threats of this dream world and use your weapons to your advantage.

Controls

  • WASD -Move
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Throw grenade
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim

Installation (Windows)

  1. Extract the contents of the ZIP to a separate folder
  2. Run MiniJam18.exe
